EmailTemplate.description: Letting partners know they've earned a 5th deal bonus
EmailTemplate.name: 2018 5th Deal Email
EmailTemplate.subject: High Five! Cash in for your 5th Deal BlueWave Bonus
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on hitting your next BlueWave Bonus milestone, {!Contact.FirstName}!
This is a big one!
To celebrate your 5th loan sale during our promotional period, we'd like to send you your choice of the Yeti Coolers shown below.
How to Cash In: Please email our team (marketing@bluewavesolar.com) with your shipping address and which item (including style & color) that you would prefer:
Yeti Tundra 35 (Color of your choice)
Yeti Hopper Flip 12 (Color of your choice)
Enjoying your BlueWave Bonuses?
We'd love to see pictures of your new gear in action, powering your solar adventures! Please email us or post on social media tagging @BlueWaveSolar.
- All of us here at BlueWave
Questions or concerns?
Partner Support Line (888) 817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com
